admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF023485-USDOE-ALTERNATIVE ENERGY ACTIVITIES,TF033794-LAOS - ENERGY, POWER,TF033494-LAOS - EDL POWER DISTRIBUTION,TF020056-GEF1 MSP LAO--PDR SOUTHERN
            PROVINCES RURAL ELECTRIFICATION

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Southern Provinces
            Rural Electrification Project for Laos are to 1) expand
            rural electricity service in 7 central and southern
            provinces where economically justified, through grid
            extension and off-grid electrification; and 2) strengthen
            the electric company's (EDL) capacity to plan and
            implement electrification investments and to operate on a
            commercial basis. The project's components are three:
            1) The Distribution Extension component will finance
            lower-cost extension of the distribution grid in rural areas
            and small towns, as well as a subtransmission system to
            electrify areas; 2) The Off-Grid Rural Electrification
            component will pilot standalone electricity systems
            including renewable energy technologies, and will develop a
            national plan for off-grid rural electrification; and 3) the
            Institution Building component will support EDL in project
            management and commercialization, and will provide
            assistance to the government in sector planning and further commercialization.
